title: Please do me a favor and turn off Autocorrect
body: I'm tired of seeing things like "every legend rework, or rally doesn't will" when the person meant "revert LeBlanc rework, it really doesn't work" and didn't proofread their post. It's a lot easier to spot and understand basic typos than it is to puzzle out which words should be replaced with similar words for a sentence to actually make sense.
